page.title: 14TIME CAPSULE, NEAVE SCHOOL
page.content:
{LOCATION:}In the centre of the grass quadrangle of the South Building.
As part of the{Domesday Project}the pupils of the{Neave School}decided to leave for posterity a{Time Capsule} filled with items and articles that hopefully will give future generations a flavour of life in a comprehensive school in I985. These items include equipment, examples of work, timetables, uniform,and photographs of school life. The time capsule in the form of a length of plastic piping is buried two feet below the ground at the point marked{Location}above.
